me.my_intro: I am Rushabh Padalia, a student and a freelance programmer. Programming is my passion, I love working with different programming languages - Java, Python, JavaScript, PHP, C#. I am also open-source enthusiast and won't mind playing with Linux whole day.

creativezombies.desc: I am also co-founder of Software Development company
creativezombies.name: CreativeZombies

projects.heading: Projects
projects.lead: Some of the recent Projects I have worked on

projects.heading: Control Over Web
projects.desc: See temperature and get notification on your android device when the fire alarm or intrusion detection sensors gets activated.

projects.heading: Ancee Website
projects.desc: Ancee Website for fashion store, which includes an administrative backhand, to make updates website easy.

projects.heading: The Royal Taj
projects.desc: A website for Royal Taj (Restaurant), The website includes ajax drive menu which fetches data from a json file.

projects.heading: Guess My Number
projects.desc: Android game application will allow children to play an educational game using virtual cards that display collections of numbers.

projects.heading: TweetX
projects.desc: A data mining project to collect information from twitter and cluster them using K-mean algorithm.

projects.heading: Safety Field Audit
projects.desc: Web based application for Engineers to input and manage safety violations by staff during work in yards. Reports generated using SSRS.
